00021 #ifndef VOCABSYMBOL_H
00022 #define VOCABSYMBOL_H
00023 
00030 #include <iostream>
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <assert.h>
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 class RightPart;
00036 
00040 class VocabSymbol {
00041 public:
00042   friend ostream & operator<<(ostream & out, const VocabSymbol & symb);
00044   bool operator!=(const string & symbName) { 
00045     return name != symbName;
00046   }
00048   void makeUsed() { wasUsed=true; }
00049   string getName() { return name; }
00050 protected:
00051   VocabSymbol(const string & n) : name(n), wasUsed(false) {}
00052   string name;
00053   bool wasUsed;
00054  private:
00055   VocabSymbol() {}
00056 
00057 public:
00061   struct IsEqual {
00062     IsEqual(const string & n) : name(n) {}
00063     bool operator() ( VocabSymbol * right ) const {
00064       return (right->getName() == name);
00065     }
00066     string name;
00067   };
00068 };
00069 
00072 class Terminal : public VocabSymbol {
00073 public:
00074   Terminal(const string & n) : VocabSymbol(n) {}
00075 };
00076 
00077 
00078 
00083 class NonTerminal : public VocabSymbol {
00084  public:
00085   NonTerminal(const string & n, int i) 
00086     : VocabSymbol(n), rhs(NULL), wasDefined(false), index(i) {}
00087   ostream & printDefinition(ostream & out);
00091   void setRightPart(RightPart * right) { 
00092     assert(right != NULL);
00093     rhs = right; 
00094     wasDefined=true;
00095   }
00096   bool isDefined() { return wasDefined; };
00097   void accept(Visitor *v);
00098   int getIndex() { return index; }
00099 
00100  private:
00101   RightPart * rhs; 
00102   bool wasDefined; 
00103   int index; 
00105 };
